document.full_text: growth in eastern europe should accelerate only slightly this year as domestic demand recovers, but trouble in the euro zone periphery, wide budget deficits and inflation pressures still pose risks, the imf said on thursday.
document.title: imf warns on eastern europe budgets
lines_and_colors: growth in eastern europe should accelerate only slightly this year as domestic demand recovers, but trouble in the euro zone periphery, wide budget deficits and inflation pressures still pose risks, the imf said on thursday.
